decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: 7015-NO.14-OAK-00 (Site location plan); 7015-NO.14-OAK-01 (Existing plans); 7015-NO.14-OAK-02 (Existing elevations); 7015-NO.14-OAK-03 (Existing section); 7015-NO.14-OAK-04 (Proposed plans); 7015-NO.14-OAK-05 (Proposed loft plan); 7015-NO.14-OAK-06 (Proposed elevations); 7015-NO.14-OAK-07 (Proposed section); 7015-NO.14-OAK-08 (Proposed block plan)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building on this site.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with the Hanwell Village Green Conservation Area Management Plan (2008), the Hanwell Village Green Conservation Area Appraisal (2008), policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021). | Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans, no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the buildings.

Reason: To protect residential amenity in accordance with policies 1.1, 1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy D4 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| The rooflights shall be of the non-projecting conservation area type and shall be installed flush with the plane of the roof and retained as such thereafter.

Reason: In the interests of ensuring a high quality of design that preserves or enhances the character and appearance of the Hanwell Village Green Conservation Area, in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Rear roof extension; and installation of two rooflights to front roof slope
